name: Stripe API
integration_details: To integrate Stripe, use their official SDK and follow the setup guide linked above.

name: Twilio API
purpose: Cloud communications platform for SMS, voice, and video.
integration_details: Twilio provides SDKs for many platforms. Use the integration guides for setup.

name: Firebase SDK
purpose: Backend platform offering authentication, database, analytics.
integration_details: Use the official Firebase SDK for integration with web or mobile apps.
